name: Dunk Masters Basketball
description:
Are you ready to play the best basketball business game ever? Become a real manager and win all the slam dunk contests with your basketball team in this clicker game!
Manage your basketball team and become the best sports manager: Invest all the money you have in building the greatest basketball team capable of winning all the slam dunk contests!

Start managing your local basketball team with a small budget and begin to sponsor it at a local level with marketing and advertising skills. Plan your strategy to make them popular, hire basketball stars and invest in making your team greater... Grow until you win in every basketball league and slam dunk competitions! Collect money, recruit players and manage your team by investing wisely! Design your financial strategy to make your basketball team grow up to the top with the best basketball stars!

- Your dreams are waiting for you: Manage your basketball team by planning a finantial strategy!
- Find funny upgrades that you will be able to unlock features while playing: A lot of surprises are waiting for you!
- Time and dedication will help you to grow your sports business in this clicker game
- Invest wisely in your business and become an excellent manager: Study every upgrade, the costs and savings of your team and win every competition!
- Beware of the many surprises this clicker game has: Receive money, win extra points and gifts to upgrade your basketball business!
- Very intuitive to play with easy mobile controls and amazing HD graphics!
- Success will come if you work hard and follow a strategy, but you will need engagement to become rich! Build your own sports empire in this clicker game!

Become the best manager in the world of sports! Do not forget to share the scores of your games with your friends on Facebook!
Are you ready to make your dreams come true?
